sentences.en: But, to doing this loses the significance of emigration.
sentences.cn: 但是，这样做就失去了移民的意义。

sentences.en: Due to poor family living Rishengchang Vote Xuzhou No. semicolon after semicolon emigration Beijing office manager.
sentences.cn: 因家境贫寒,住日升昌票号苏州分号,后移住北京任分号经理.

sentences.en: Then there is emigration , encouraged by low pay, poor working conditions and bad public services.
sentences.cn: 低收入 、 简陋的工作条件以及糟糕的公共服务使得两国都有不少人移居国外.

sentences.en: They have known colonization, revolution and emigration.
sentences.cn: 他们了解殖民、革命还有移民。

sentences.en: We have reminded them of the circumstances of our emigration and settlement here.
sentences.cn: 我们也曾把我们移民来这里和在这里定居的情况告诉他们。

words.tran_cn: 移民；移民出境；移居外国
